title: Sevenoaks
name: Chartwell
hours: Open Wednesday to Sunday from 25 March '06 to 29 Oct '06. Also open Tuesday 4 Jul–3 Sep '06. House open 11:00-17:00
content: Family home of Sir Winston Churchill, with magnificent views over the Weald of Kent. Car park (for countryside access) open daily, 09:00-17:00
